Static Boxes

Simple Icon boxes

Display an eye catching feature matrix by using Bulkit icon boxes. Simple icon boxes are available in several color schemes. Available modifiers are .primary, .secondary, .accent, .info, .success, .warning and .danger.

Hover icon Boxes

Square Icon boxes

Display an eye catching feature matrix by using Bulkit hover icon boxes. Hover icon boxes are available in several color schemes and have a square shape by default. Available modifiers are .primary, .secondary, .accent, .info, .success, .warning and .danger.

Circle Icon boxes

Display an eye catching feature matrix by using Bulkit hover icon boxes. Hover icon boxes are available in several color schemes and can be rounded. Add the .rounded class to a .square-icon-box element to make it rounded. Available color modifiers are .primary, .secondary, .accent, .info, .success, .warning and .danger.

3

Special icon Boxes

Shadow Icon boxes

Display an eye catching feature matrix by using Bulkit long shadow icon boxes. Long shadow icon boxes are available in several color schemes and have a square shape by default. Available modifiers are .is-primary, .is-secondary, .is-accent, .is-info, .is-success, .is-warning and .is-danger. Note that these boxes work only with Font Awesome icons at the moment.

Shadow Icon boxes

Display an eye catching feature matrix by using Bulkit long shadow icon boxes. Long shadow icon boxes are available in several color schemes and have a square shape by default. You can make them rounded by adding the .rounded class to a .shadow-icon-box element. Available modifiers are .is-primary, .is-secondary, .is-accent, .is-info, .is-success, .is-warning and .is-danger. Note that these boxes work only with Font Awesome icons at the moment.
